>
[Heedless Spurs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=658)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 76

**Price** 5,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn anklets

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These wicked-looking spiked metal wheels fit around the ankles and jingle when the wearer walks, imposing a –1 item penalty on [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks. If used as a weapon, they are treated as a [spiked gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per 10 minutes;  **Requirements** You are riding a mount; **Effect** You kick both spurs into your mount's flank. Your mount takes 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and gains the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition for 1 minute or until the persistent bleed damage ends, whichever comes first. It can use the extra action only to Stride.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
